topSection.title: Premier Series
topSection.sub_title: Hot tubbing with a touch of elegance
topSection.top_paragraph_content: Hot tubbing with a touch of elegance - wood-wrapped siding, pillows & LED lights! Freeflow Spas hot tubs can fit almost anywhere— backyard, condo balconies, and porches.

large.caption: Premier Series features aesthetic upgrades such as wood-like siding and exterior LED lights.
Contoured pillows add an extra touch of relaxation to your soak.

With the Premier Series, hot tubbers get added color options like Arctic White in additional to the popular Sand and Taupe shell. Pair it with Brown or Charcoal siding, and you get a touch of elegance to any backyard.
The Premier Series boasts all the features hot tubbers love from the Sport Series, like waterfall, digital control panel, and built-in ice bucket.
Fantasy Spas Premier Series hot tubs redefine family time, with room for grandparents, kids, and grandkids.

items.sub_title: Unibody, lightweight shell so you don’t even need 10 people to help you carry it on your next camping trip to Mt. Everest.
Outlets can run, but they can’t hide! Find an outlet, plug it in, and fire up your Fantasy spa lickity split.
Keep the temperature high, and the electric bill low with full foam insulation and a locking thermal cover.
The Premier Series features Wood-like siding, contoured pillows, and exterior LED lights that clearly differentiate it from the Sport Series.

large.title: Use it 1X a day to relax & recharge
large.desc: I use my Freeflow spa at least once a day. It's my time to relax and recharge. It's been wonderful during the Minnesota winters (and fall and spring!) as well, because I'm able to still get outside and get some fresh air while staying warm. Easy to maintain.

large.title: Never loses temp & kids love it
large.desc: We love our Freeflow spa. Never lose temp and ready to go as soon as we get home from work and want to slip away into a hot bubbly pure relaxation destination- right on our patio! Big hit with the kiddos when it’s off season to swim in the big pool. Definitely recommend it to all my friends of all ages. Quarantining at home with our Monterey- made it easy to stay in place! Lol

large.title: Great Buy - Use it almost day
large.desc: We love our Freeflow Monterey Premier that we purchased in April. It has been a great buy and we use it almost daily. Highly recommended!

bottomSection.title: Shop Other Hot Tub Collections
bottomSection.sub_title: With three different hot tub Collections there's one that fits your lifestyle.

primary_images.desc: Everything you want in a hot tub

products.name: FRESHWATER® SALT SYSTEM READY
products.desc: A revolution in worry-free water care that helps you spend more time enjoying your spa and less time maintaining it.

products.name: WIRELESS REMOTE CONTROL
products.desc: Operate spa functions from anywhere in the spa and up to 30 feet away with this unique, easy-to-read color touchscreen.

products.name: MOTO-MASSAGE® DX JET
products.desc: Patented moving jets provide two powerful water streams that sweep up and down your back for a massage like no other.

products.name: SUPER ENERGY EFFICIENT AND ENERGY SMART®
products.desc: High-density, full-foam insulation is the same found in commercial freezers. With the comprehensive Energy Smart system of innovations, these are our most energy-efficient hot tubs.

products.name: 100% NO-BYPASS FILTRATION AND TRI-X®
products.desc: All the water is filtered all the time and dishwasher-safe Tri-X filters help keep water crystal clear.

products.name: POLYMER STRUCTURE AND BASE PAN
products.desc: Built for durability and long life with a structure that will never rust or rot.
